latest news.eng_title: This Playoff Matchup Would Be Catastrophic For The Guardians
latest news.summary: The Cleveland Guardians are at risk of facing the New York Yankees in a Wild Card game if they lose their lead in the AL Central. The Guardians have a 3.5 game lead over the Kansas City Royals, but with 17 games remaining, the Royals could take the lead and demote the Guardians to a Wild Card spot. The Yankees and Baltimore Orioles are separated by just a half-game in the AL East, and if both teams win their divisions, the likely matchup in a Wild Card game would be the Guardians and Yankees. The Guardians have a poor record against the Yankees, with a 2-4 record and being outscored 36-22. Star player Aaron Judge has been particularly dominant against the Guardians, hitting five home runs in 24 at-bats. The Guardians would likely finish below the Yankees in the standings if they lose their lead, and would then have to play in New York for the three-game series, where they have a record of 40-37. 'The end of the season is important for the Guardians,' said the article, 'to keep the Yankees as far away as possible, the team should look to clinch the AL Central.'
latest news.title: This Playoff Matchup Would Be Catastrophic For The Guardians

latest news.eng_title: Juan Soto Unconcerned About The Battle For The AL East Title
latest news.summary: Juan Soto, a New York Yankees player, expressed his focus on winning games rather than worrying about the AL East title. 'We're really focused on what we can do here,' he said. 'We're trying to win games and that's all that matters now.' The Yankees are tied with the Cleveland Guardians for the best record in the American League, 0.5 games behind the Orioles. The division winner would likely earn a bye in the first round of the playoffs, while the second-place team would face the Houston Astros. The Yankees and Orioles play a three-game series at Yankee Stadium before the final weekend of the season, with the Orioles having won six of their 10 matchups this season.
latest news.title: Juan Soto Unconcerned About The Battle For The AL East Title

latest news.eng_title: MLB standings 2024: Updated playoff bracket, magic numbers through Sept. 9
latest news.summary: The MLB postseason is heating up, with familiar teams like the Dodgers, Phillies, and Astros in the hunt. The Dodgers aim for their 11th consecutive postseason appearance, while Shohei Ohtani seeks his first. The Yankees have improved after a disappointing 2023, and the Mets and Padres have rebounded from tough seasons. The Royals and Orioles are upstart franchises in the mix, while the Braves and Rangers are struggling to keep up. By September 29, 12 teams will have clinched a postseason berth, with the last handful of spots decided by the final weekend. The magic number, which ranges from 10 to 163, indicates how close each team is to clinching. For example, if a team leading the division has 90 wins and the second-place team has 63 losses, their magic number would be 10.
latest news.title: MLB standings 2024: Updated playoff bracket, magic numbers through Sept. 9

latest news.eng_title: New York Yankees Surpass Their 2023 Win Total With Latest Victory
latest news.summary: The New York Yankees have surpassed their 2023 win total with their 83rd victory of the season, putting them in a better position than last year. The team has a 1.5-game lead on the Baltimore Orioles for first place in the American League East and a one-game lead over the Cleveland Guardians for the top seed in the AL. The Yankees have enjoyed a great season on both sides of the ball, with the 2nd-best OPS (.770) in MLB and the 16th-toughest schedule remaining. According to The Post and Courier, 'The Yankees have the longest active streak in the sport for winning seasons.' The team's manager has not been quoted in the article, but the team's performance speaks for itself.
latest news.title: New York Yankees Surpass Their 2023 Win Total With Latest Victory

latest news.eng_title: MLB Power Rankings: Yankees Continue to Fall, Red Sox Slip, NL Team Surges
latest news.summary: With the MLB regular season nearing its conclusion, playoff races are heating up in both the American and National Leagues. The New York Yankees have a half-game lead over the Baltimore Orioles, but have lost seven of their last 11 games. The Red Sox, who were once a threat for a Wild Card berth, have gone 5-11 since August 22 and are now four games out of the third and final Wild Card spot in the AL. Meanwhile, the San Diego Padres have a half-game lead over the Arizona Diamondbacks and a two-game lead over the Atlanta Braves in the NL. The Braves are hanging onto a playoff spot for dear life, as they have an identical record to the New York Mets. The Yankees have called up their top prospect, outfielder Jasson Dominguez, in an attempt to boost their struggling offense.
latest news.title: MLB Power Rankings: Yankees Continue to Fall, Red Sox Slip, NL Team Surges

Nestor Cortes (6-10, 4.20 ERA) will start for the Yankees against Joey Cantillo (0-2, 6.23 ERA) for the Guardians. The model also predicts that the over/under total of 8.5 runs has a 53% chance of going over. The recommended best bet is to bet on Over 8.5 runs (+100).
news knowledge.title: Cleveland Guardians vs. New York Yankees prediction: Free MLB picks, odds for Wednesday 8/21/2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Yankees vs. Guardians Prediction: Expert Picks, Odds, Stats & Best Bets – Wednesday, August 21, 2024
news knowledge.summary: The New York Yankees (73-53) host the Cleveland Guardians (73-52) at 7:05 p.m. ET on Wednesday, August 21, 2024. The Yankees' Aaron Judge is batting .332 this year, second in the league, while the Guardians' Steven Kwan ranks fourth in the majors with a .313 average. Nestor Cortes Jr. will start for the Yankees, while Joey Cantillo will make his first start of the season for the Guardians. The Yankees have been the moneyline favorite 98 times this season, going 54-44 in those games. The Guardians have been underdogs 48 times, winning 23 of those contests. The Yankees have the No. 3 offense in MLB, scoring 5.1 runs per game, while the Guardians rank 13th with 572 total runs scored. The game's total is set at 8.5 runs, with the Yankees favored to win at -185 odds.
news knowledge.title: Yankees vs. Guardians Prediction: Expert Picks, Odds, Stats & Best Bets – Wednesday, August 21, 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Guardians overcome Soto, Judge homers, top Yankees in longest game of 2024
news knowledge.summary: The Cleveland Guardians overcame the New York Yankees in the longest game of the 2024 MLB season, winning 9-5 in a four-hour, five-minute contest. Lane Thomas knocked in the go-ahead run, while David Fry hit a three-run triple as part of a six-run 12th inning. Yankees stars Aaron Judge and Juan Soto each homered in the loss. Thomas said, 'Obviously, I haven't felt that great at the plate lately, but I was happy to come in and take a good at-bat.' The Guardians held on to their lead in the American League Central, while the Yankees dropped to second place in the American League East.
news knowledge.title: Guardians overcome Soto, Judge homers, top Yankees in longest game of 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Guardians outlast Yankees in 12 innings to win longest MLB game this season
news knowledge.summary: The Cleveland Guardians outlasted the New York Yankees 9-5 in the longest major league game this season, lasting 12 innings. The game had an October feel, with both teams in first place, and a potential playoff preview at Yankee Stadium. The game was tied at 3 after four innings, but neither team scored again until the 12th inning, when Lane Thomas delivered a go-ahead double to spark a six-run inning. As stated by the article, the game had a tense and October-like feel, with both teams in first place, making it a potential playoff preview.
news knowledge.title: Guardians outlast Yankees in 12 innings to win longest MLB game this season

news knowledge.eng_title: Here are the Yankees and Guardians starting lineups for series opener on Tuesday night
news knowledge.summary: The New York Yankees are looking to continue their strong performance in the American League, and their next series against the Cleveland Guardians could be a turning point in the second half of the season. The Guardians are just half a game back of the Yankees for the best record in the AL and lead the AL Central division. The Yankees have held the upper hand in head-to-head meetings since the start of the 2023 season, winning three consecutive series, including two out of three games in April at Progressive Field. With a softer schedule ahead, a successful series against the Guardians could give the Yankees a boost. As Aaron Judge said, 'it could be the turning point of the second half'.
news knowledge.title: Here are the Yankees and Guardians starting lineups for series opener on Tuesday night

news knowledge.eng_title: How to watch and listen to today's New York Yankees vs Cleveland Guardians MLB game: Live stream, regional networks, radio station, team news, start time
news knowledge.summary: The New York Yankees are set to host the Cleveland Guardians on August 20, 2024, at 7:05 pm ET/4:05 pm PT. The Yankees are in first place in the AL East with a record of 73–52 overall and 32–27 at home, while the Guardians are in first place in the AL Central with a record of 72–52 overall and 34–32 on the road. The game can be watched on MLB.tv, YES, BSGL, or streamed on FuboTV with a 7-day free trial. SiriusXM will provide live play-by-play commentary. Aaron Judge has been a key offensive leader for the Yankees, while José Ramírez has contributed 100 RBIs and 32 home runs for the Guardians. The Yankees have a slight edge on the Guardians, having won four of their last five meetings.
news knowledge.title: How to watch and listen to today's New York Yankees vs Cleveland Guardians MLB game: Live stream, regional networks, radio station, team news, start time

news knowledge.eng_title: Yankees climb above Orioles, Guardians to secure best record in MLB for first time since June
news knowledge.summary: The New York Yankees have secured the best record in Major League Baseball for the first time since June 21. Their win over the Tigers, combined with losses by the Orioles and Guardians, gave them the top spot in the MLB standings. The Yankees had a poor stretch from June 7 to July 26, losing 15 times in 26 games, but have since rebounded with a 13-5 record in their last 18 games. However, their lead is precarious, and they could fall to second place in the AL East if they lose and the Orioles win on Saturday. The Yankees have two games remaining against the Tigers and will host the Guardians next week, while their final series against the Orioles is scheduled for September 24-26 at Yankee Stadium.
news knowledge.title: Yankees climb above Orioles, Guardians to secure best record in MLB for first time since June

news knowledge.eng_title: MLB storylines that will shape the rest of the 2024 season
news knowledge.summary: The 2024 MLB season has seen a shift in power with the top teams from June 15 now struggling to maintain their pace. The New York Yankees, Baltimore Orioles, Cleveland Guardians, and Philadelphia Phillies were all on a 105-win pace, but have since dropped off. The Arizona Diamondbacks, San Diego Padres, Houston Astros, and New York Mets have taken over as the top teams. The season is heating up with division races tightening, and several key players to watch down the stretch. The NL MVP race is also closer than expected, with Shohei Ohtani and Ketel Marte leading the pack. Additionally, the possibility of a sub-.300 batting champion and a pitcher winning 20 games are also on the table.
news knowledge.title: MLB storylines that will shape the rest of the 2024 season

news knowledge.eng_title: Why Are There No Good Teams In Baseball This Year?
news knowledge.summary: The 2024 Major League Baseball season has seen a lack of dominant teams, with the Cleveland Guardians currently on pace for 96 wins and a run differential corresponding to a 93-win team. According to Baseball-Reference's simple rating system, only the Yankees are more than a run per game better than the average MLB team. The MLB's incentive structure, including the addition of a third wild-card spot, has led to parity among teams. Owners are investing in their rosters to reach the 80-85 win threshold, and the free agency market has provided valuable depth for teams. Additionally, the proliferation of analytics has led to improved pitch development and design, making it easier for middle-class teams to build competitive rotations. As a result, several division races could go down to the wire, and jockeying for playoff seeding should continue until the final day of the season.
news knowledge.title: Why Are There No Good Teams In Baseball This Year?

news knowledge.eng_title: Yankees have key advantage over Orioles, Guardians in final playoff push
news knowledge.summary: The New York Yankees have regained their momentum, winning five consecutive games, including a sweep of the Philadelphia Phillies. With the final two months of the season approaching, the Yankees have a significant advantage, boasting the third-easiest strength of schedule (.477) in MLB, according to Tankathon's rankings. In contrast, the Baltimore Orioles have the 10th-easiest schedule (.496), while the Cleveland Guardians have the fourth-most difficult schedule (.520). The Yankees must capitalize on this opportunity, particularly in their upcoming series against the Orioles (Sept. 24-26) and Guardians (Aug. 20-22), to maintain their head-to-head record and secure a strong playoff push.
news knowledge.title: Yankees have key advantage over Orioles, Guardians in final playoff push
